title: record keeping
extract: The legal requirements for keeping business records. By law you must keep business records: for a minimum of five years or longer after the record is created, updated or the transaction is completed (whichever is most recent) in English or in a form the Australian Taxation Office (ATO) can understand.May 30, 2018
extract_html: The legal requirements for keeping business records. By law you must keep business records: for a minimum of five years or longer after the record is created, updated or the transaction is completed (whichever is most recent) in English or in a form the Australian Taxation Office (ATO) can understand.May 30, 2018
